name: Zakim Room-Walk to Subway&Logan airport
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a mix of young working professionals and families that have lived in the neighborhood their entire lives. Folks are friendly and the street is well lit & quiet at night.  About a 7 minute walk away is a square where you can get Pizza, Peruvian, Mexican, Colombian, and Italian food.
description:
Welcome!

If you are visiting Boston for work, play or just on short layover, this is the perfect place for you to stay.

The space
More information
• Memory Foam Mattress to rest after a long day of travel or sightseeing!
• Great for couples and solo travelers.
• 3 minute walk to a nearby subway will take you to the heart of Boston in less then 15 minutes!
• Affordable, great price for central location!
• USB charging outlets, no need to worry about bringing adapters/ converters to charge your mobile phones.
• All of the amenities provided, plus free drinks and snacks for all our guests.
• Front door and room doors all have electronic keypad locks. Secure and no keys to fuss with!
• Easy access to airport - 14 minute walk to the airport shuttle or 1 subway stop away.
• Room air conditioner installed to keep cool during the summer and a portable space heater if you like it extra toasty during winter.
